name: DigitalOcean
description: Delete file or folder content of DigitalOcean Spaces Bucket
author: Marcelo Forment√£o

inputs.name: digitalCredentials
inputs.label: DigitalOcean Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select the service endpoint for your DigitalOcean connection.
To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service endpoint based on AWS configuration.

inputs.name: digitalRegion
inputs.label: DigitalOcean Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DigitalOcean datacenter region code (nyc3, ams3, sgp1, etc.) of the region containing the Spaces resource(s) the task will use.

inputs.name: digitalBucket
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the bucket where the content will be deleted.

inputs.name: digitalGlobExpressions
inputs.label: Filename Patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Glob patterns to select the file and folder content to be deleted.
Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns and also exclude patterns.

inputs.name: digitalTargetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder (Spaces key prefix)
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The target folder (referred to as a key prefix in Spaces) in the bucket that contains the files.
If not set the root of the bucket is assumed, BE CAREFUL!. You can use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988).

messages.SearchingFiles: Searching '%s' prefix for files to delete
messages.DeletingFilesCompleted: Completed deleting files from %s in bucket %s
messages.TaskCompleted: All specified files deleted from Space completed
